original_text: Esther was one of the young women that the king's officers took to Susa. That happened because of the king's command. The beautiful young women lived in the royal harem. Hegai had the authority to take care of them.
korean_text: 왕의 조서와 명령이 반포되매 처녀들이 도성 수산에 많이 모여 헤개의 수하에 나아갈 때에 에스더도 왕궁으로 이끌려 가서 궁녀를 주관하는 헤개의 수하에 속하니

sentences.original_text: Esther was one of the young women
sentences.korean_translation: 에스더는 젊은 여성 중 한 사람이었습니다

sentences.original_text: that the king's officers took to Susa
That happened because of the king's command
